question.title: Monthly Transactions I
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists Transactions (id int, country varchar(4), state enum('approved', 'declined'), amount int, trans_date date)
insert into Transactions (id, country, state, amount, trans_date) values ('121', 'US', 'approved', '1000', '2018-12-18')
